title: FS/FT:  T206 Cobb Johnson Mathewson Speaker Young
author: bounce

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  T206 Cobb Johnson Mathewson Speaker Young
posts.post_content:
Trading hasn't quite worked, so making these available for sale as well.

As always, I would consider trades for the same players, particularly "uncommon" backs.  I only collect HOFers if anything was a "throw in" for a deal.

"I'll take it" takes precedent over any negotiations via PM or email, which is [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Shipping included to make it easy, prices are PayPal F&F otherwise add 3% for the fee.

More pics available on request.


Ty Cobb red portrait Polar Bear SGC 40 - $4,500

Walter Johnson portrait Sovereign 350 PSA 4 - $5,500
Walter Johnson pitching Old Mill SGC 60 - $3,500

Tris Speaker Sovereign 350 PSA 6 - $5,000

Cy Young portrait Sovereign 350 SGC 4 - $3,750



Walter Johnson portrait Sovereign 350 PSA 2 - $SOLD
Christy Mathewson white cap Sovereign 150 - $SOLD
Cy Young portrait Sovereign 150 PSA 2.5 - $SOLD
.

sold a couple, around again

i would consider trades for Cobb/Johnson/Mathewson/Young in similar grades, I do collect the different backs if anyone is looking to shake things up

Hi David,

Would you do $2400 for the Walter Johnson PSA 2?

Andy Geller

Which are still available?
Thank you
